mutants.code:
def min_compressions_needed(n, m, songs):
    A = []
    B = []
    diff = []
    for (a, b) in songs:
        A.append(a)
        B.append(b)
        diff.append(a - b)
    diff.sort(reverse=True)
    if sum(B) >= m:
        return -1
    x = sum(A)
    i = 0
    while x > m:
        x -= diff[i]
        i += 1
    return i
